item.title: Hello, Hcy.life
item.description: Drips and draps —— 点点滴滴 What to talk about Once deciding to set up a new site, which audience to display to is a concret stuff needs to be considered primarily. Maybe intuition bring me there. I bought the domain coincidencily yesterday, for the reason of its simple meaning My Life, 当然，我在尝试发布与另一个博客
